name: In the Matter of the ADOPTION OF Anthony Louis SABEC, II, a/k/a Anthony L. Sabec. Kathleen Alma SABEC, Appellant, v. Barry D. LIVINGSTONE and Louise D. Livingstone

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: In the Matter of the ADOPTION OF Anthony Louis SABEC, II, a/k/a Anthony L. Sabec. Kathleen Alma SABEC, Appellant, v. Barry D. LIVINGSTONE and Louise D. Livingstone.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each side to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Mary Warman Terry, Warman & Warman, Uniontown, for appellant.
Robert L. Webster, Webster & Hallal, Uniontown, for Barry D. Livingstone and Louise D. Livingstone.
David E. Cohen, Uniontown, for Barry D. Livingstone and Louise D. Livingstone.
casebody.head_matter:
384 A.2d 592
In the Matter of the ADOPTION OF Anthony Louis SABEC, II, a/k/a Anthony L. Sabec. Kathleen Alma SABEC, Appellant, v. Barry D. LIVINGSTONE and Louise D. Livingstone.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 9, 1978.
Decided April 7, 1978.
Mary Warman Terry, Warman & Warman, Uniontown, for appellant.
Robert L. Webster, Webster & Hallal, Uniontown, for Barry D. Livingstone and Louise D. Livingstone.
David E. Cohen, Uniontown, for Barry D. Livingstone and Louise D. Livingstone.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
